Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe perfectly aligns with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but considering its importance to you, I am confident it will serve you well. I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $9500. This special offer is tailored to ensure you receive a high-quality product at a competitive price, reflecting both its worth and my desire to see it in capable hands. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $9,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $9,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
